properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
AEGEAN SEA.
DNC 09.
1. GUNNERY AND MISSILE OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS
   0530Z TO SUNSET WEDNESDAY THRU SATURDAY UNTIL
   31 DEC:
   A. IN AREA BOUND BY
      36-18N 024-07E, 36-18N 025-59E,
      36-25N 026-12E, 36-16N 026-40E,
      35-36N 026-41E, 35-31N 024-11E,
      35-36N 024-07E.
   B. IN AREA WITHIN 1000 METERS OF 35-32N 024-13E.
   C. IN AREA WITHIN 1000 METERS OF
      35-36.33N 024-10.00E.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 01 JAN 23.
